trustfund:
TF050895-MALI THIRD STRUCTURAL
            ADJUSTMENT CREDIT (SAC III) TF

abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Structural Adjustment Credit
            (SACIII) Project aims to provide balance of payments support
            to the Government, to close the financing gap stemming from
            the recent crisis in the cotton sector, enabling the
            Government to maintain momentum on its ongoing reform
            agenda, notably the following priority reform areas: a)
            public expenditure reforms aimed specifically at advancing
            the Government's poverty reduction objectives; and, b)
            recovery and restructuring of the cotton sector to restore
            positive economic growth. Satisfactory progress of the
            reform program, and of the macroeconomic policy framework
            grant the release of the third tranche, conditional to the
            privatization of two cotton sector companies - Office de la
            Haute Vallee du Niger, and Huilerie Cotonniere du Mali -
            and, on progress in preparing the medium term expenditure
            frameworks, particularly for the education, and health
            sectors. All conditions for the release of the Third Tranche
            have been met, being the execution of the program broadly
            satisfactory, thus the tranche amount is now available for disbursement.
